channel.title: Error - Exception In Thread 6
channel.description: [code]Playing 0-hangar.mid Error downloading news Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1400) at client.method146(client.java:11914) at client.method102(client.java:7747) at client.method9(client.java:8620) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4450) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] It usually happens when I'm attacking Smoke Devils...

item.title: Error - Exception In Thread 6
item.dc:creator: @Xerxes Xerxes
item.description:
@Xerxes wrote:

Look at thread 6, see if you find error there. <3 count the threads in the forum, find the nr 6 thread. k. good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Error - Exception In Thread 6
item.dc:creator: @newbiehacker newbiehacker
item.description:
@newbiehacker wrote:

no because if it wasn’t in the original, it shouldn’t be in the private client.
which means it’s a server-side error sending the 0’s that the client is dividing by.

Read full topic
